name: lustfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving strong sexual desire: They watched each other admiringly, almost lustfully. Old men lustfully eyed pretty women walking by.
having a powerful feeling of wanting something: She stared lustfully at the chocolate cake.
More examplesFewer examplesThey chased each other lustfully around the playground.The film preview shows a scene of a man and woman lustfully kissing. I still look lustfully at food I know I shouldn't be eating.I’ve never longed for tools or gazed lustfully at a truck.
